name: pin_removed
desc: A pin was removed from a channel.
long_desc: My Slack API Start herenew App features Messaging Reference Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Resources Community A pin was removed from a channel Compatibility: RTM Events API When an item is un-pinned from a channel, the pin_removed event is sent to all members of that channel. The has_pins property indicates that there are other pinned items in that channel.
